Indoleacrylic acid (IAA), as a plant hormone, was found to have the function to promote anti-inflammatory responses and therapeutic benefits
42 , and previous study has shown that IAA can inhibit tumor cell invasion, migration and cell proliferation in a dose-independent manner
43 . It was reported that psoromic acid has antioxidant and cardiovascular protective effects
44 . These top differential metabolites have their own effects and they work together to change the pharmacological activity of Salvia miltiorrhiza.
